name: TAMAGO (CornuGameStudio)
description:
It's a tiny Game about Chinese Dragon Boat Festival.

Using Mouse or Finger to drag and balancing the egg.

Eggs Balancing (Standing Eggs) is a traditional Chinese folk game. On Dragon Boat Festival (May 5th of the lunar calendar), people try standing the eggs at noon. 

Happy Dragon Boat Festival!

Try your best.

" Egg Master " can get the " Golden Egg " ! 

(Font:ARCADEPI)
